definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Some pacifistsand all militarists deprecate social and political conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 和一切军国主义者都反对社会性和政治性的斗争。

sentences.english: The wood ant, for example, is a social creature, and acts as a slave for the blood-red ant Formica sanguinea.
sentences.chinese: 例如，木蚁是一种社会性动物，充当血红林蚁的奴隶。

sentences.english: Man is a social animal. He finds his fulfillment in association with others.
sentences.chinese: 人是社会性动物，在与他人的交往中寻找满足感。

sentences.english: There's social faux pas around the molestation of children.
sentences.chinese: 这种社会性的失礼，是对小孩子的骚扰。

sentences.english: Caijingkun focused on researching early childhood psychological development and social development.
sentences.chinese: 蔡景昆先生专注于幼儿心理发展和社会性发展的研究。

sentences.english: Study on the origin of tea culture;
sentences.chinese: 茶文化雅俗共赏，具有广泛的社会性。

sentences.english: However, Reznor is not alone in wanting out of the social media scene.
sentences.chinese: 但是想离开社会性媒体的不只是Reznor一个人。

sentences.english: Then I want to look at one case study of a nonsocial emotion, that of fear.
sentences.chinese: 然后做一个非社会性情感案例分析，关于恐惧。

sentences.english: The sub-clinical state has a fairly strong social property.
sentences.chinese: 亚健康状态具有很强的社会性。

sentences.english: He was always concerned with the needs of the disadvantaged, always initiating social debates.
sentences.chinese: 他总是关心弱势群体的需求，经常发起社会性的讨论。

sentences.english: It reflected an information management the catholicity and the society of the activity.
sentences.chinese: 它反映了信息管理活动的普遍性和社会性。

sentences.english: It incubates in literary works as "a mutual social emotion".
sentences.chinese: 它化作“社会性的共同情感”潜伏在文学作品中。

sentences.english: Infant social development is one of the important contents of infant education.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的社会性培养是幼儿教育的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: I don't get the sense that the same function of social catharsis was ever really served by dubstep.
sentences.chinese: 我不感觉dubstep真能起到社会性宣泄的作用。

definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
